Wolfpack

Jun 13, 2016

Wolfpack is back!

My old team from my group project during The Iron yard is back together. We’ve decided to start a side project, all four of us, just for fun (I mean experience!). It’ll be nice to not only have a legitimate project to work on again, but also to be part of a group (more pressure to get stuff done when you have other people counting on your work to be finished). Tomorrow is our first official meeting.
